summary: Email correspondence between Kristina Lee Hendrickson of American Express's Special Investigations Financial Intelligence Unit and an individual named Rossmiller regarding Jeffrey Epstein's American Express accounts. Hendrickson offers to provide a copy of a file related to Epstein's account activity.

persons.name: Kristina Lee Hendrickson
persons.role: Manager - Special Investigations Financial Intelligence Unit at American Express
persons.context: American Express employee who previously spoke with Rossmiller about Jeffrey Epstein's American Express accounts and is now offering to send a file related to that activity.

persons.name: Rossmiller
persons.context: Person who previously spoke with Kristina Hendrickson about Jeffrey Epstein's American Express accounts and is being offered a copy of a related file.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Individual whose American Express account activity is being discussed and investigated by American Express's Special Investigations unit.

connections.description: Correspondence regarding sharing investigative information about Jeffrey Epstein's American Express accounts.
Hendrickson is investigating Epstein's American Express account activity as part of her role in American Express's Special Investigations unit.
Rossmiller has previously discussed Epstein's American Express accounts with Hendrickson and is being offered related files.

events.title: American Express offers Epstein account file
events.description: Kristina Hendrickson of American Express's Special Investigations unit emails Rossmiller offering to send a file related to Jeffrey Epstein's American Express account activity.

events.title: Previous discussion about Epstein's American Express accounts
events.description: Kristina Hendrickson and Rossmiller previously spoke about Jeffrey Epstein's American Express account activity.

locations.name: American Express Financial Intelligence Unit
locations.context: Location of American Express's Special Investigations Financial Intelligence Unit where Kristina Hendrickson works.

keyFacts: American Express's Special Investigations Financial Intelligence Unit was investigating Jeffrey Epstein's American Express account activity.
Kristina Lee Hendrickson, a manager at American Express, offered to provide a file related to Epstein's American Express accounts to someone named Rossmiller.
The correspondence indicates ongoing financial investigation into Epstein's activities by American Express as of January 2020.
The email suggests American Express had compiled investigative files on Epstein's financial transactions.
